text: @muffinmad It's great. You really should try it. It's a mod for source, so if you have any source game it's free. If you don't google:ati/nividia (depending on what card you own) haflife deathmatch free (they made an offer, if you own either of their cards you get HL2:DM for free so it's not fishy.). And you can get Halflife deathmatch for free. Then install the mod.

author: Sinkofesto

text:
An album I discovered a couple months ago, I really love it. If you like this kind of music I recommend checking out the other songs and maybe even buying the album (plus it supports the composer!). NeoTokyo is a Half Life 2 mod, I have yet to try it out myself.

I particularly like this track, the part at 4:55 and the build up to it is awesome. It's pretty long so I like to surf the net while listening to it.
